akn:subsection.akn:heading: National Science Foundation and Director; functions

akn:content.akn:p: (a) National Science Foundation and Director; functions The National Science Foundation is designated as the lead agency responsible for implementing Arctic research policy, and the Director of the National Science Foundation shall insure that the requirements of section 4107 of this title are fulfilled.
